title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 575.11 - Coordination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 575.11 - Coordination

State Regulations

This Part does not affect the authority of the Department
of Agriculture and Markets. The Department of Agriculture and Markets shall
inspect registered growers and dealers of plant material pursuant to

Agriculture and Markets Law, article 14 section 166, for compliance with this

Part. Any violation issued by the Department of Agriculture and Markets shall
be referred to the Department of Environmental Conservation for assessment of
penalties pursuant to Environmental Conservation Law, section
71-0703. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
575.11

Adopted, New

York State Register September 10, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 36, eff. 9/10/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
